column4: i've got another computer with onboard video, and it's got *extremely* laggy video in X, i assume it has the wrong driver - but i dont know what kind of onboard video it is - any ideas?
the xorg log reports it all - but I can't remember where I saw it earlier today :(
- i think it's using the wrong driver tho and i don't know what/how to tell it otherwise
It'll tell you the device, and from that you can Google or whatever for the correct driver
